itemDescription: British photographer, actor, writer and director

wikipedia_page.main: Pat Kelman (b. Patrick Kelly) is a British film distributor, photographer, director, writer and actor. Born in Chelmsford, Essex, he was raised in Cornwall where he now lives after spending 20 years in London. He was trained at the University of London.

response: | The Odyssey || NBC / Hallmark Entertainment / American Zoetrope || Andrei Konchalovsky (director/screenplay); Armand Assante, Greta Scacchi, Isabella Rossellini, Vanessa Williams, Bernadette Peters, Eric Roberts, Geraldine Chaplin, Jeroen Krabbé, Christopher Lee, Irene Papas, Michael J. * Pat Kelman as the Ultron Postie; a postman from Ultron (Series 3–6)

The Ultron Postie (Pat Kelman) is a postman from Ultron who delivers messages and gadgets to Thermoman from the high council. He often mysteriously arrives through the wall in George and Janet's bathroom.
2005 Delabole Slate Audience Award Film of the Festival: Encounters, Dir: Pat Kelman Prod.: Jonty Reason on behalf of Pittot Films
* Pat Kelman, British director, writer and actor
